wolt.title: Wireless and ultra-light RTLS Solutions
wolt.text: WOLT is an on-premise location solution based on ultra-ligh wireless infrastructure. Tags have a global location option on the LoRaWAN network.

bulletpoints.text: enables asset location with sub-metric accuracy
to know the approximate position of a tag in relation to the anchors.
if an asset is an area of interest

bubbles.text: Install our solution easily and quickly
Identify congestion points and reduce downtime
Adapt location needs to different use cases
Optimize the moves of your assets / routes
Improve the performance of your business

descriptions.list: Placed on your assets, is located in relation to the anchors
Communicates with the Cloud through the IoT LAN created by the Gateway
Three sizes with differents capacities according to the use
Set of virtualized localization and management services

wizzipark.title: The smart wireless real-time parking solution
wizzipark.text: Wireless and autonomous parking sensors instantly detect the arrival or departure of vehicles and relay the information to the WizziCloud through the gateway. Visitors have real-time access to available places that can be communicated on dynamic displays.

bulletpoints.text: its LED changes color depending on the status of the place and the use case.

bubbles.text: Improve the reception process and driver satisfaction
Optimize the occupancy rate of your car park
Operate a parking space reservation system
Inform visitors about the specific space of the car park
Reduce search time for a parking space available.

descriptions.list: Sends presence information to the gateway
Displays the status of the space by integrated light feedback
Sends presence information to the gateway
Retrieves the information passing through the gateway(s)
Allow to configure the sensors and the gateway
Provides activity statistics (number of visitors, occupancy rate,...)
All of your car parks supervised on a single interface

wisp.title: The solution that connects to your environment

text.p: Using environmental sensors, data is collected and transmitted in the form of indicators.
WISP digitizes your data such as temperature, pressure, humidity, brightness, ...
This information allows you to analyze the selected indicators in order to complete and improve your decision-making process.
Wizzilab can rely on this “off-the-shelf” solution to address specific use cases.

support.dash7text: We have a particular commitment with DASH7, a technology specifically tailored for mid-range IoT. WizziLab is an active member of the DASH7 Alliance since 2011, chairs the Protocol Action Group and develops D7A products.
support.dash7info: All information on the DASH7 protocol is freely accessible on the

values.name: CREATIVITY
values.text: Combining the potential of Technology with the inventiveness of our team to meet your challenges

values.name: LISTENING
values.text: Adapting to your environment and expectations in order to provide the best solution

values.name: COMMITMENT
values.text: Advising and supporting you in your projects by providing the best service

knowhow.title: Our Know-how
knowhow.howtitle: Since 2011, Wizzilab uses its expertises to succeed in your transformation by

actions.title: Releasing the extraordinary capacities of IoT.
actions.text: The new generations of electronic components and new wireless technologies announce a revolution in our capacity to grasp the reality of our environment. A better understanding of our everyday challenges, allows to optimize processes, to reduce risks and to save resources.

actions.title: Mastering the technologies and performance of your installations
actions.text: We provide the optimal solution by adapting the technology to the needs such as: energy consumption, connectivity and environmental constraints.

actions.title: Providing useful data
actions.text: Data is the key source for successfully transforming your business. Its relevance is correlated with its level of accuracy, reliability and protection. It must be delivered at the right time in order to impact the analysis and decision-making process.

knowhow.conceptiontext: At WizziLab, we put in practice a strict conception philosophy:

tabs.title: End-to-end system development.
tabs.content: We always have in mind the overall specification, the cost and low power challenges relative to the system, so every component is tailored to function efficiently with the rest of the system.

tabs.title: Optimal wireless communication.
tabs.content: We believe that the availability of network infrastructures meeting the large-scale & low-cost requirements of IoT is a prerequisite to the success of any IoT system. We combine different wireless technologies, DASH7, LoRaWAN and cellular among others, in order to optimize the trade-offs of data throughput, range, and power consumption.

tabs.title: Localization.
tabs.content: Indoor and outdoor positioning is at the core of a multitude of professional and private applications. We have developed a strong expertise in UWB wireless, which allows us to estimate distances with a sub-meter precision.

tabs.title: Cascade event-driven decisions.
tabs.content: We use low power triggers to wake up more power consuming modes. This allows to keep the power consumption extremely low, while providing the best functional value.

tabs.title: Edge computing and embedded algorithms.
tabs.content: Information is processed and filtered in the edge nodes, whenever needed, with the ability to redirect and aggregate data flows. This allows to optimize the processing at every stage, avoids overflows and provides only meaningful data to the application service.

tabs.title: Centralized fleet management.
tabs.content: An efficient IoT system requires an intuitive and simple way to serve and configure the fleet of IoT end nodes. We conceive our systems to guarantee that they can be accessible throughout their life for maintenance, reconfiguration, security and firmware update.

privacypolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacypolicy.rgpdtext: Numéro d’inscription à la CNIL : 1610284 v 0. Vous disposez d’un droit d’accès, de modification, de rectification et de suppression des données qui vous concernent (art. 34 de la loi « Informatique et Libertés » du 6 janvier 1978). Vous pouvez, à tout moment , demander à exercer ce droit soit en nous contactant à cette adresse mail contact@wizzilab.com, soit en nous adressant un courrier à l’adresse suivante : WizziLab SARL – 64 rue Greneta – 75002 Paris – FRANCE
privacypolicy.copyrighttext1: L’ensemble des éléments figurant sur notre site sont protégés par les dispositions du Code de la Propriété Intellectuelle. En conséquence, toute reproduction de ceux-ci, totale ou partielle, ou imitation, sans notre accord exprès, préalable et écrit, est interdite.
privacypolicy.copyrighttext2: Il est formellement interdit de collecter et d’utiliser les informations disponibles sur le site à des fins commerciales. Cette interdiction s’étend notamment, sans que cette liste ne soit limitative, à tout élément rédactionnel figurant sur le site, à la présentation des écrans, aux logiciels nécessaires à l’exploitation, aux logos, images, photos, graphiques, de quelque nature qu’ils soient.
